short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: VideoBack allows you to start your videos from where you left off the last time you watched them.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Imagine you're watching a video, but you need to stop. No worries! VideoBack remembers exactly where you paused. So, when you come back, it starts right where you left off.


*************************** How It Works ***************************

Easy Start: Install VideoBack – it's super easy!
Watch Any Video: Enjoy your favorite videos.
Take a Break:  When you need to pause, VideoBack silently remembers exactly where you stopped.
Come Back Anytime: When you return, VideoBack automatically plays from where you stopped.


*************************** Why VideoBack ***************************

No Effort Needed: No need to remember stuff or use bookmarks. VideoBack does all the work for you.
Works Everywhere: It works with all sorts of video platforms.
Privacy First: Your video history isn’t shared with anyone
